text: Hey all, is there a way to export Joomla blog content and import into HubSpot?
Joomla > Wordpress > HubSpot
or
Joomla > XML Exporter (Convert it to a wordpress xml syntax) > HubSpot

Hi all. Anybody had any experience with international domain names? A client of ours uses a norwegian special character in their URL. We tried to set up a subdomain using the international domain name, but get an error message saying that international domain names are not supported.   Is there really no support for this? We spoke to support and they told us this was due to a double dash in the international domain name.   Do you know of any workarounds?
Thanks Chad. Good shout!
I can confirm that the xml exporter plugin for Joomla. works (or did last time I tried).
So with the design certification, is it now going to be reflective of the new design manager or the old one?

Right now it reflects the old Design Manager. We are going to update it though to reflect the new one. <@U3PKJ8EQL> is our new Professor for the Dev/Design Tools, so he's going to work on updating it.

Also, (maybe it just me) but some of the questions on the current one are off a bit. Like:
>What option is used when making changes to a single instance of a global module?
>Convert Global to Local
>Make a Local Copy
>Edit Options
>Edit Module
when editing this, the text is "Edit Global Module" so technically none of the answers are correct

Thanks  AJ! I'm filing that away in my notes on this thing. Most likely this certification is going to look pretty darn different to the current one. Actually, keep an eye out, because I will be reaching out to folks in this group while researching the update.
If you need testing or anything feel free to reach out, happy to help where i can

Odd client request: They want when someone fills out a form - the notification emails that their team recieves - to not display any of the information that was submitted, just a notification that something was submitted. Anyone know if this is at all possible.
maybe a custom workflow?
Thatâ€™s not a bad idea
Same
Custom workflow will be the only option and then turn off the HubSpot notifications or remove their email from getting those. They are sent from HubSpot so we don't have control over them in any way.
Awesome. Putting you both on my running list of folks to consult...
Anyone know where to edit the blog comment alert email template? (the one that goes both to the internal team member and the ones that are sent to the contact who subscribed)
You can't as far as I know...
